title: House for sale in kiribathgoda
details:
Architecturally designed 2 Storied House around 2700 Sq Ft. situated at Kiribathgoda,
5 Rooms, 2 Bathrooms, Pantry, Balconies, Living Room, Dining Room ,
Large garden space,

Calm & quite area / Good Neighborhood

200 m to main road (Makola Road)
15 Feet wide Road Access to the House.

Conveniently located on a 15 feet road off Mihindu mawatha, Makola

Perches 46 rectangle block can be used as two blocks

Suitable for Residential family

Please call for more information
